title: FF! Doc | CredentialCheckingPipe
listItems: Required Support a current transaction; create a new one if none exists.
Supports Support a current transaction; execute non-transactionally if none exists.
Mandatory Support a current transaction; throw an exception if no current transaction exists.
RequiresNew Create a new transaction, suspending the current transaction if one exists.
NotSupported Do not support a current transaction; rather always execute non-transactionally.
Never Do not support a current transaction; throw an exception if a current transaction exists.

CredentialCheckingPipe
Pipes
Pipe to check the the CredentialFactory (for testing only).
See also
Github - CredentialCheckingPipe Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.pipes.CredentialCheckingPipe
Syntax
Copy
<CredentialCheckingPipe name=""/>
Attributes
Required
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
name	text	-
The functional name of this pipe. It can be referenced by the path attribute of a PipeForward.
Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
authAlias	text	-
targetPassword	text	-
targetUserid	text	-
defaultPassword	text	-
defaultUserid	text	-
FixedForwardPipe
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
skipOnEmptyInput	boolean	false
If true, the processing continues directly at the forward of this pipe, without executing the pipe itself, if the input is empty.
ifParam	text	-
If set, this pipe is only executed when the value of the parameter with the name if
